about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm a Midudev and ManzDev mod but I'm happier being an AnaRangel mod
about.description: I am a Frontend Web Developer and WordPress Developer with over 3 years of experience, specialized in creating modern designs and optimizing web performance, with a focus on technologies such as HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript ES6+ and WordPress. I handle frameworks such as React and Astro, and I am an expert in WordPress visual builders, in addition to having a strong technical knowledge in Core Web Vitals, which makes me a passionate and highly qualified professional for any web development project.
